fields.name: ZMK_WSL
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Write Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes (software and hardware) to the ZMK registers and the ZMK_HWP, ZMK_VAL, and ZMK_ECC_EN fields of the LPMKCR

fields.name: ZMK_RSL
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Read Soft Lock When set, prevents any software reads to the ZMK Registers and ZMK_ECC_VALUE field of the LPMKCR

enumeratedValues.name: READ_ALLOWED
enumeratedValues.description: Read access is allowed (only in software Programming mode)

fields.name: SRTC_SL
fields.description: Secure Real Time Counter Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes to the SRTC Registers, SRTC_ENV, and SRTC_INV_EN bits

fields.name: LPCALB_SL
fields.description: LP Calibration Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes to the LP Calibration Value (LPCALB_VAL) and LP Calibration Enable (LPCALB_EN)

fields.name: MC_SL
fields.description: Monotonic Counter Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes (increments) to the MC Registers and MC_ENV bit

fields.name: GPR_SL
fields.description: General Purpose Register Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes to the GPR

fields.name: LPSVCR_SL
fields.description: LP Security Violation Control Register Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes to the LPSVCR

fields.name: LPSECR_SL
fields.description: LP Security Events Configuration Register Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes to the LPSECR

fields.name: MKS_SL
fields.description: Master Key Select Soft Lock When set, prevents any writes to the MASTER_KEY_SEL field of the LPMKCR

fields.name: HPSVCR_L
fields.description: HP Security Violation Control Register Lock When set, prevents any writes to the HPSVCR

fields.name: HPSICR_L
fields.description: HP Security Interrupt Control Register Lock When set, prevents any writes to the HPSICR

fields.name: HAC_L
fields.description: High Assurance Counter Lock When set, prevents any writes to HPHACIVR, HPHACR, and HAC_EN bit of HPCOMR

fields.name: SSM_ST
fields.description: SSM State Transition Transition state of the system security monitor

fields.name: SSM_ST_DIS
fields.description: SSM Secure to Trusted State Transition Disable When set, disables the SSM transition from secure to trusted state

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Secure to Trusted State transition is enabled

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Secure to Trusted State transition is disabled

fields.name: SSM_SFNS_DIS
fields.description: SSM Soft Fail to Non-Secure State Transition Disable When set, it disables the SSM transition from soft fail to non-secure state

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Soft Fail to Non-Secure State transition is enabled

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Soft Fail to Non-Secure State transition is disabled

fields.name: LP_SWR
fields.description: LP Software Reset When set to 1, most registers in the SNVS_LP section are reset, but the following registers are not reset by an LP software reset: Monotonic Counter Secure Real Time Counter Time Alarm Register This bit cannot be set when the LP_SWR_DIS bit is set

fields.name: LP_SWR_DIS
fields.description: LP Software Reset Disable When set, disables the LP software reset

fields.name: SW_SV
fields.description: Software Security Violation When set, the system security monitor treats this bit as a non-fatal security violation

fields.name: SW_FSV
fields.description: Software Fatal Security Violation When set, the system security monitor treats this bit as a fatal security violation

fields.name: SW_LPSV
fields.description: LP Software Security Violation When set, SNVS_LP treats this bit as a security violation

fields.name: PROG_ZMK
fields.description: Program Zeroizable Master Key This bit activates ZMK hardware programming mechanism

fields.name: MKS_EN
fields.description: Master Key Select Enable When not set, the one time programmable (OTP) master key is selected by default

enumeratedValues.name: SELECT_OTP
enumeratedValues.description: OTP master key is selected as an SNVS master key

enumeratedValues.name: SELECT_PER_LPMKCR
enumeratedValues.description: SNVS master key is selected according to the setting of the MASTER_KEY_SEL field of LPMKCR

fields.name: HAC_EN
fields.description: High Assurance Counter Enable This bit controls the SSM transition from the soft fail to the hard fail state

fields.name: HAC_LOAD
fields.description: High Assurance Counter Load When set, it loads the High Assurance Counter Register with the value of the High Assurance Counter Load Register

fields.name: HAC_CLEAR
fields.description: High Assurance Counter Clear When set, it clears the High Assurance Counter Register

fields.name: HAC_STOP
fields.description: High Assurance Counter Stop This bit can be set only when SSM is in soft fail state

fields.name: NPSWA_EN
fields.description: Non-Privileged Software Access Enable When set, allows non-privileged software to access all SNVS registers, including those that are privileged software read/write access only

fields.name: RTC_EN
fields.description: HP Real Time Counter Enable

fields.name: HPTA_EN
fields.description: HP Time Alarm Enable When set, the time alarm interrupt is generated if the value in the HP Time Alarm Registers is equal to the value of the HP Real Time Counter

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: HP Time Alarm Interrupt is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: HP Time Alarm Interrupt is enabled

fields.name: DIS_PI
fields.description: Disable periodic interrupt in the functional interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Periodic interrupt will trigger a functional interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Disable periodic interrupt in the function interrupt

fields.name: PI_EN
fields.description: HP Periodic Interrupt Enable The periodic interrupt can be generated only if the HP Real Time Counter is enabled

fields.name: PI_FREQ
fields.description: Periodic Interrupt Frequency Defines frequency of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_0
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 0 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_1
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 1 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_2
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 2 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_3
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 3 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_4
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 4 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_5
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 5 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_6
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 6 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_7
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 7 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_8
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 8 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_9
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 9 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_10
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 10 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_11
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 11 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_12
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 12 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_13
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 13 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_14
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 14 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: USE_BIT_1r5
enumeratedValues.description: - bit 15 of the HPRTCLR is selected as a source of the periodic interrupt

fields.name: HPCALB_EN
fields.description: HP Real Time Counter Calibration Enabled Indicates that the time calibration mechanism is enabled.

fields.name: HPCALB_VAL
fields.description: HP Calibration Value Defines signed calibration value for the HP Real Time Counter

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_0_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +0 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_1_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +1 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_2_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +2 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_15_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +15 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_16_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -16 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_15_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -15 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_2_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -2 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_1_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -1 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter

fields.name: HP_TS
fields.description: HP Time Synchronize

enumeratedValues.name: SYNC_TIME
enumeratedValues.description: Synchronize the HP Time Counter to the LP Time Counter

fields.name: BTN_CONFIG
fields.description: Button Configuration

fields.name: BTN_MASK
fields.description: Button interrupt mask

fields.name: SV0_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 0 Interrupt Enable Setting this bit to 1 enables generation of the security interrupt to the host processor upon detection of the Security Violation 0 security violation

fields.name: SV1_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 1 Interrupt Enable Setting this bit to 1 enables generation of the security interrupt to the host processor upon detection of the Security Violation 1 security violation

fields.name: SV2_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 2 Interrupt Enable Setting this bit to 1 enables generation of the security interrupt to the host processor upon detection of the Security Violation 2 security violation

fields.name: SV3_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 3 Interrupt Enable Setting this bit to 1 enables generation of the security interrupt to the host processor upon detection of the Security Violation 3 security violation

fields.name: SV4_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 4 Interrupt Enable Setting this bit to 1 enables generation of the security interrupt to the host processor upon detection of the Security Violation 4 security violation

fields.name: SV5_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 5 Interrupt Enable Setting this bit to 1 enables generation of the security interrupt to the host processor upon detection of the Security Violation 5 security violation

fields.name: LPSVI_EN
fields.description: LP Security Violation Interrupt Enable This bit enables generating of the security interrupt to the host processor upon security violation signal from the LP section

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LP Security Violation Interrupt is Disabled

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LP Security Violation Interrupt is Enabled

fields.name: SV0_CFG
fields.description: Security Violation 0 Security Violation Configuration This field configures the Security Violation 0 Security Violation Input

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 0 is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 0 is a fatal violation

fields.name: SV1_CFG
fields.description: Security Violation 1 Security Violation Configuration This field configures the Security Violation 1 Security Violation Input

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 1 is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 1 is a fatal violation

fields.name: SV2_CFG
fields.description: Security Violation 2 Security Violation Configuration This field configures the Security Violation 2 Security Violation Input

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 2 is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 2 is a fatal violation

fields.name: SV3_CFG
fields.description: Security Violation 3 Security Violation Configuration This field configures the Security Violation 3 Security Violation Input

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 3 is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 3 is a fatal violation

fields.name: SV4_CFG
fields.description: Security Violation 4 Security Violation Configuration This field configures the Security Violation 4 Security Violation Input

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 4 is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 4 is a fatal violation

fields.name: SV5_CFG
fields.description: Security Violation 5 Security Violation Configuration This field configures the Security Violation 5 Security Violation Input

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 5 is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 5 is a fatal violation

fields.name: LPSV_CFG
fields.description: LP Security Violation Configuration This field configures the LP security violation source.

enumeratedValues.name: NON_FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: LP security violation is a non-fatal violation

enumeratedValues.name: FATAL
enumeratedValues.description: LP security violation is a fatal violation

fields.name: HPTA
fields.description: HP Time Alarm Indicates that the HP Time Alarm has occurred since this bit was last cleared.

fields.name: PI
fields.description: Periodic Interrupt Indicates that periodic interrupt has occurred since this bit was last cleared.

fields.name: LPDIS
fields.description: Low Power Disable If 1, the low power section has been disabled by means of an input signal to SNVS

fields.name: BTN
fields.description: Button Value of the BTN input

fields.name: BI
fields.description: Button Interrupt Signal ipi_snvs_btn_int_b was asserted.

fields.name: SSM_STATE
fields.description: System Security Monitor State This field contains the encoded state of the SSM's state machine

enumeratedValues.name: INTERMEDIATE
enumeratedValues.description: Init Intermediate (transition state between Init and Check - SSM stays in this state only one clock cycle)

fields.name: SYS_SECURITY_CFG
fields.description: System Security Configuration This field reflects the three security configuration inputs to SNVS

enumeratedValues.name: FAB_CONFIG
enumeratedValues.description: Fab Configuration - the default configuration of newly fabricated chips

enumeratedValues.name: OPEN_CONFIG
enumeratedValues.description: Open Configuration - the configuration after NXP-programmable fuses have been blown

enumeratedValues.name: CLOSED_CONFIG
enumeratedValues.description: Closed Configuration - the configuration after OEM-programmable fuses have been blown

enumeratedValues.name: FIELD_RETURN_CONFIG
enumeratedValues.description: Field Return Configuration - the configuration of chips that are returned to NXP for analysis

fields.name: SYS_SECURE_BOOT
fields.description: System Secure Boot If SYS_SECURE_BOOT is 1, the chip boots from internal ROM

fields.name: OTPMK_SYNDROME
fields.description: One Time Programmable Master Key Syndrome In the case of a single-bit error, the eight lower bits of this value indicate the bit number of error location

fields.name: OTPMK_ZERO
fields.description: One Time Programmable Master Key is Equal to Zero

fields.name: ZMK_ZERO
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key is Equal to Zero

fields.name: SV0
fields.description: Security Violation 0 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: No Security Violation 0 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 0 security violation was detected.

fields.name: SV1
fields.description: Security Violation 1 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: No Security Violation 1 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 1 security violation was detected.

fields.name: SV2
fields.description: Security Violation 2 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: No Security Violation 2 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 2 security violation was detected.

fields.name: SV3
fields.description: Security Violation 3 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: No Security Violation 3 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 3 security violation was detected.

fields.name: SV4
fields.description: Security Violation 4 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: No Security Violation 4 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 4 security violation was detected.

fields.name: SV5
fields.description: Security Violation 5 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: No Security Violation 5 security violation was detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 5 security violation was detected.

fields.name: SW_SV
fields.description: Software Security Violation This bit is a read-only copy of the SW_SV bit in the HP Command Register

fields.name: SW_FSV
fields.description: Software Fatal Security Violation This bit is a read-only copy of the SW_FSV bit in the HP Command Register

fields.name: SW_LPSV
fields.description: LP Software Security Violation This bit is a read-only copy of the SW_LPSV bit in the HP Command Register

fields.name: ZMK_SYNDROME
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Syndrome The ZMK syndrome indicates the single-bit error location and parity for the ZMK register

fields.name: ZMK_ECC_FAIL
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Error Correcting Code Check Failure When set, this bit triggers a bad key violation to the SSM and a security violation to the SNVS_LP section, which clears security sensitive data

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: ZMK ECC Failure was not detected.

fields.name: LP_SEC_VIO
fields.description: LP Security Violation A security volation was detected in the SNVS low power section

registers.name: HPHACIVR
registers.description: SNVS_HP High Assurance Counter IV Register

fields.name: HAC_COUNTER_IV
fields.description: High Assurance Counter Initial Value This register is used to set the starting count value to the high assurance counter

fields.name: HAC_COUNTER
fields.description: High Assurance Counter When the HAC_EN bit is set and the SSM is in the soft fail state, this counter starts to count down with the system clock

registers.name: HPRTCMR
registers.description: SNVS_HP Real Time Counter MSB Register

fields.name: RTC
fields.description: HP Real Time Counter The most-significant 15 bits of the RTC

registers.name: HPRTCLR
registers.description: SNVS_HP Real Time Counter LSB Register

fields.name: RTC
fields.description: HP Real Time Counter least-significant 32 bits

fields.name: HPTA_MS
fields.description: HP Time Alarm, most-significant 15 bits

fields.name: HPTA_LS
fields.description: HP Time Alarm, 32 least-significant bits

fields.name: ZMK_WHL
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Write Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes (software and hardware) to the ZMK registers and ZMK_HWP, ZMK_VAL, and ZMK_ECC_EN fields of the LPMKCR

fields.name: ZMK_RHL
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Read Hard Lock When set, prevents any software reads to the ZMK registers and ZMK_ECC_VALUE field of the LPMKCR

enumeratedValues.name: READ_ACCESS_ALLOWED
enumeratedValues.description: Read access is allowed (only in software programming mode).

fields.name: SRTC_HL
fields.description: Secure Real Time Counter Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes to the SRTC registers, SRTC_ENV, and SRTC_INV_EN bits

fields.name: LPCALB_HL
fields.description: LP Calibration Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes to the LP Calibration Value (LPCALB_VAL) and LP Calibration Enable (LPCALB_EN)

fields.name: MC_HL
fields.description: Monotonic Counter Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes (increments) to the MC Registers and MC_ENV bit

fields.name: GPR_HL
fields.description: General Purpose Register Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes to the GPR

fields.name: LPSVCR_HL
fields.description: LP Security Violation Control Register Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes to the LPSVCR

fields.name: LPSECR_HL
fields.description: LP Security Events Configuration Register Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes to the LPSECR

fields.name: MKS_HL
fields.description: Master Key Select Hard Lock When set, prevents any writes to the MASTER_KEY_SEL field of the LP Master Key Control Register

fields.name: SRTC_ENV
fields.description: Secure Real Time Counter Enabled and Valid When set, the SRTC becomes operational

fields.name: LPTA_EN
fields.description: LP Time Alarm Enable When set, the SNVS functional interrupt is asserted if the LP Time Alarm Register is equal to the 32 MSBs of the secure real time counter

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LP time alarm interrupt is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: LP time alarm interrupt is enabled.

fields.name: MC_ENV
fields.description: Monotonic Counter Enabled and Valid When set, the MC can be incremented (by write transaction to the LPSMCMR or LPSMCLR)

fields.name: LPWUI_EN
fields.description: LP Wake-Up Interrupt Enable This interrupt line should be connected to the external pin and is intended to inform the external chip about an SNVS_LP event (MC rollover, SRTC rollover, or time alarm )

fields.name: SRTC_INV_EN
fields.description: If this bit is 1, in the case of a security violation the SRTC stops counting and the SRTC is invalidated (SRTC_ENV bit is cleared)

enumeratedValues.name: KEEP_VALID
enumeratedValues.description: SRTC stays valid in the case of security violation (other than a software violation (HPSVSR[SW_LPSV] = 1 or HPCOMR[SW_LPSV] = 1)).

enumeratedValues.name: INVALIDATE
enumeratedValues.description: SRTC is invalidated in the case of security violation.

fields.name: DP_EN
fields.description: Dumb PMIC Enabled When set, software can control the system power

fields.name: TOP
fields.description: Turn off System Power Asserting this bit causes a signal to be sent to the Power Management IC to turn off the system power

fields.name: LVD_EN
fields.description: Digital Low-Voltage Event Enable By default the detection of a low-voltage event does not cause the pmic_en_b signal to be asserted

fields.name: LPCALB_EN
fields.description: LP Calibration Enable When set, enables the SRTC calibration mechanism

fields.name: LPCALB_VAL
fields.description: LP Calibration Value Defines signed calibration value for SRTC

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_0_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +0 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_1_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +1 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_2_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +2 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: ADD_15_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: +15 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_16_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -16 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_15_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -15 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_2_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -2 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

enumeratedValues.name: SUB_1_PER_32768_TICKS
enumeratedValues.description: -1 counts per each 32768 ticks of the counter clock

fields.name: BTN_PRESS_TIME
fields.description: This field configures the button press time out values for the PMIC Logic

fields.name: DEBOUNCE
fields.description: This field configures the amount of debounce time for the BTN input signal

fields.name: ON_TIME
fields.description: The ON_TIME field is used to configure the period of time after BTN is asserted before pmic_en_b is asserted to turn on the SoC power

fields.name: PK_EN
fields.description: PMIC On Request Enable The value written to PK_EN will be asserted on output signal snvs_lp_pk_en

fields.name: PK_OVERRIDE
fields.description: PMIC On Request Override The value written to PK_OVERRIDE will be asserted on output signal snvs_lp_pk_override

fields.name: GPR_Z_DIS
fields.description: General Purpose Registers Zeroization Disable

fields.name: MASTER_KEY_SEL
fields.description: Master Key Select These bits select the SNVS Master Key output when Master Key Select bits are enabled by MKS_EN bit in the HPCOMR

enumeratedValues.name: SELECT_OTPMK
enumeratedValues.description: Select one time programmable master key.

enumeratedValues.name: SELECT_ZMK
enumeratedValues.description: Select zeroizable master key when MKS_EN bit is set .

enumeratedValues.name: SELECT_COMBO
enumeratedValues.description: Select combined master key when MKS_EN bit is set .

fields.name: ZMK_HWP
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key hardware Programming mode When set, only the hardware key programming mechanism can set the ZMK and software cannot read it

enumeratedValues.name: SW_PROG_MODE
enumeratedValues.description: ZMK is in the software programming mode.

enumeratedValues.name: HW_PROG_MODE
enumeratedValues.description: ZMK is in the hardware programming mode.

fields.name: ZMK_VAL
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Valid When set, the ZMK value can be selected by the master key control block for use by cryptographic modules

fields.name: ZMK_ECC_EN
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Error Correcting Code Check Enable Writing one to this field automatically calculates and sets the ZMK ECC value in the ZMK_ECC_VALUE field of this register

fields.name: ZMK_ECC_VALUE
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Error Correcting Code Value This field is automatically calculated and set when one is written into ZMK_ECC_EN bit of this register

fields.name: SV0_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 0 Enable This bit enables Security Violation 0 Input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 0 is disabled in the LP domain.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 0 is enabled in the LP domain.

fields.name: SV1_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 1 Enable This bit enables Security Violation 1 Input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 1 is disabled in the LP domain.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 1 is enabled in the LP domain.

fields.name: SV2_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 2 Enable This bit enables Security Violation 2 Input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 2 is disabled in the LP domain.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 2 is enabled in the LP domain.

fields.name: SV3_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 3 Enable This bit enables Security Violation 3 Input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 3 is disabled in the LP domain.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 3 is enabled in the LP domain.

fields.name: SV4_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 4 Enable This bit enables Security Violation 4 Input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 4 is disabled in the LP domain.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 4 is enabled in the LP domain.

fields.name: SV5_EN
fields.description: Security Violation 5 Enable This bit enables Security Violation 5 Input

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 5 is disabled in the LP domain.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: Security Violation 5 is enabled in the LP domain.

fields.name: SRTCR_EN
fields.description: SRTC Rollover Enable When set, an SRTC rollover event generates an LP security violation.

fields.name: MCR_EN
fields.description: MC Rollover Enable When set, an MC Rollover event generates an LP security violation.

fields.name: PFD_OBSERV
fields.description: System Power Fail Detector (PFD) Observability Flop The asynchronous reset input of this flop is connected directly to the inverted output of the PFD analog circuitry (external to the SNVS block)

fields.name: POR_OBSERV
fields.description: Power On Reset (POR) Observability Flop The asynchronous reset input of this flop is connected directly to the output of the POR analog circuitry (external to the SNVS

fields.name: LTDC
fields.description: Low Temp Detect Configuration These configuration bits are wired as an output of the module.

fields.name: HTDC
fields.description: High Temperature Detect Configuration These configuration bits are wired as an output of the module

fields.name: VRC
fields.description: Voltage Reference Configuration These configuration bits are wired as an output of the module.

fields.name: OSCB
fields.description: Oscillator Bypass When OSCB=1 the osc_bypass signal is asserted

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_BYPASSED
enumeratedValues.description: Normal SRTC clock oscillator not bypassed.

enumeratedValues.name: BYPASSED
enumeratedValues.description: Normal SRTC clock oscillator bypassed. Alternate clock can drive the SRTC clock source.

fields.name: LPTA
fields.description: LP Time Alarm

fields.name: SRTCR
fields.description: Secure Real Time Counter Rollover

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: SRTC has not reached its maximum value.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: SRTC has reached its maximum value.

fields.name: MCR
fields.description: Monotonic Counter Rollover

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: MC has not reached its maximum value.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: MC has reached its maximum value.

fields.name: LVD
fields.description: Digital Low Voltage Event Detected

fields.name: ESVD
fields.description: External Security Violation Detected Indicates that a security violation is detected on one of the HP security violation ports

fields.name: EO
fields.description: Emergency Off This bit is set when a power off is requested.

fields.name: SPOF
fields.description: Set Power Off The SPO bit is set when the power button is pressed longer than the configured debounce time

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: Set Power Off was not detected.

fields.name: SPON
fields.description: Set Power On The SPON bit is set when the set_pwr_on_irq interrupt is triggered, which happens when the power button is pressed longer than the configured debounce time

enumeratedValues.name: NOREPORT
enumeratedValues.description: Set Power On Interrupt was not detected.

enumeratedValues.name: REPORTED
enumeratedValues.description: Set Power On Interrupt was detected.

fields.name: LPNS
fields.description: LP Section is Non-Secured Indicates that LP section was provisioned/programmed in the non-secure state

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_PRGRMD_IN_NON_SECURE_STATE
enumeratedValues.description: LP section was not programmed in the non-secure state.

enumeratedValues.name: WAS_PRGRMD_IN_NON_SECURE_STATE
enumeratedValues.description: LP section was programmed in the non-secure state.

fields.name: LPS
fields.description: LP Section is Secured Indicates that the LP section is provisioned/programmed in the secure or trusted state

enumeratedValues.name: NOT_PRGRMD_IN_SECURE_OR_TRUSTED_STATE
enumeratedValues.description: LP section was not programmed in secure or trusted state.

enumeratedValues.name: WAS_PRGRMD_IN_SECURE_OR_TRUSTED_STATE
enumeratedValues.description: LP section was programmed in secure or trusted state.

registers.name: LPSRTCMR
registers.description: SNVS_LP Secure Real Time Counter MSB Register

fields.name: SRTC
fields.description: LP Secure Real Time Counter The most-significant 15 bits of the SRTC

registers.name: LPSRTCLR
registers.description: SNVS_LP Secure Real Time Counter LSB Register

fields.name: SRTC
fields.description: LP Secure Real Time Counter least-significant 32 bits This register can be programmed only when SRTC is not active and not locked, meaning the SRTC_ENV, SRTC_SL, and SRTC_HL bits are not set

fields.name: LPTA
fields.description: LP Time Alarm This register can be programmed only when the LP time alarm is disabled (LPTA_EN bit is not set)

registers.name: LPSMCMR
registers.description: SNVS_LP Secure Monotonic Counter MSB Register

fields.name: MON_COUNTER
fields.description: Monotonic Counter most-significant 16 Bits Note that writing to this register does not change the value of this field to the value that was written

fields.name: MC_ERA_BITS
fields.description: Monotonic Counter Era Bits These bits are inputs to the module and typically connect to fuses

registers.name: LPSMCLR
registers.description: SNVS_LP Secure Monotonic Counter LSB Register

fields.name: MON_COUNTER
fields.description: Monotonic Counter bits Note that writing to this register does not change the value of this field to the value that was written

fields.name: LVD
fields.description: Low-Voltage Detector Value

fields.name: GPR
fields.description: General Purpose Register When GPR_SL or GPR_HL bit is set, the register cannot be programmed.

fields.name: ZMK
fields.description: Zeroizable Master Key Each of these registers contains 32 bits of the 256-bit ZMK value

fields.name: GPR
fields.description: General Purpose Register When GPR_SL or GPR_HL bit is set, the register cannot be programmed.

fields.name: GPR
fields.description: General Purpose Register When GPR_SL or GPR_HL bit is set, the register cannot be programmed.

fields.name: MINOR_REV
fields.description: SNVS block minor version number

fields.name: MAJOR_REV
fields.description: SNVS block major version number

fields.name: IP_ID
fields.description: SNVS block ID

fields.name: CONFIG_OPT
fields.description: SNVS Configuration Options

fields.name: ECO_REV
fields.description: SNVS ECO Revision

fields.name: INTG_OPT
fields.description: SNVS Integration Options

fields.name: IP_ERA
fields.description: IP Era 00h - Era 1 or 2 03h - Era 3 04h - Era 4 05h - Era 5 06h - Era 6
